td.p: We are proud to welcome JamGlue to the Creative Commons Sample Pool. JamGlue's mission is to provide "Remxing for the Masses" by allowing anybody to try their hand at remixing right in the comfort of their browser. Sites like JamGlue are an important step in giving music back to the people that matter the most: all of us. (JamGlue is not officially affiliated with Creative Commons or ccMixter, we're just think they are cool and want to use their samples.)

div.p: Members of JamGlue are encouraged to create their remixes directly on their site using original source material from either their site or.... (drum roll) here at ccMixter. When a JamGlue remix uses sources from here our 'Samples are used in' field will reflect the remix with a link to it...

Not only does JamGlue host remixes made on their website, but they have a pretty amazing sample collection as well. Here at ccMixter we've added JamGlue to the remix upload form's search capability so you can use their samples in remixes posted here. See the freesound page for how to properly attribute samples that come from another sample pool.
